label.text: Over recent decades, polar bears have spent more time on land.
This has led to more interactions between bears and humans. In some cases, these interactions cause serious conflict that may endanger human life or damage property.
This graph summarises the types of bear and human interactions that result in serious conflicts. The data was collected from villages in the Chukchi Sea area.
At a community meeting, a villager from the Chukchi Sea area said that if you do not approach polar bears, they will not cause you harm.
Does the data in the graph support this claim?
Based on the data in the graph, explain one action that villagers could take that would address the largest cause of serious conflict between bears and humans.
